About Us
content:
About

Samriddhi enables organisations to unlock Sustainable Growth through Enhancing People Capability in Business Strategy Interventions. Our unique approach of placing robust, measurable business outcomes at the heart of our practice has helped create powerful, sustainable interventions for organisations. We do this by designing bespoke solutions centered in your business landscape and act as long-term partners who's incentives are aligned to meeting your business goals.



Photo by Steve Halama on Unsplash

At Samriddhi, we love to look forward and walk into uncharted territories to bring back innovative solutions for our partner clients


Our Values

Trust

We care deeply about understanding our customers and build long term relations with them

Synergy

We believe that the problems are best solved by leveraging partnerships in today’s connected eco-system

Customer Centricity

We care deeply about understanding customer needs and building trusting relations with our clients

Leadership

Nagarajan, Pranesh

Director - GTM | UX

Growth Consultant | Go-To-Market Specialist | foodie | coffee afficionado | chef-dad |

Kumar, Vidhi

Director - People Capability

Instructional Design Specialist | Dale Carnegie Certified Trainer | Hogan Assessments Coach | yoga afficionado | cleanliness freak | storyteller |
